overview: Two 30 something stoner friends use lies and deceit to convince their straight laced  neigbour to unknowingly drive them across the country to pick up some weed in this hilarious low budget comedy film.  Watch the film here for free:  https://youtu.be/jdGMtJKsX2s
tagline: Forget Need for Speed, this time, its all about the weed
title: Need For Weed
